description:
I will discuss the past benefits of using gevent, greenlet and twisted
and how asyncio acts as a new solution in Python 3. This talk will focus
on the new async/await features for Python 3.5, as well as the Pulsar
library, a powerful coroutine library that builds on asyncio coroutines.
title: Coroutines, Async/Await, Asyncio and the Pulsar Library
